org.snmptweet.twitter
Class KeyContainer

java.lang.Object
  org.snmptweet.twitter.KeyContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class KeyContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is used for serialize the access on twitter.

See Also:

KeyContainer

public KeyContainer()
Constructor used to create a new KeyContainer with SNMP Tweet consumer keys.

KeyContainer

public KeyContainer(java.lang.String cons,
                    java.lang.String secret)
Constructor used to create a new KeyContainer without User access token

Parameters:
cons - Application consumer key
secret - Application secret consumer key

KeyContainer

public KeyContainer(java.lang.String cons,
                    java.lang.String secret,
                    java.lang.String token,
                    java.lang.String tokensecret)
Constructor used to create a new KeyContainer with a User access token

Parameters:
cons - Application consumer key
secret - Application secret consumer key
token - User access token key
tokensecret - User access secret token key

Serialize

public void Serialize()
               throws java.lang.Exception
Method used to serialize a KeyContainer object. File name depend on KEYS_FILENAME macro

java.lang.Exception - Execption on serializing object

                                throws java.lang.Exception

isHastoken

public boolean isHastoken()
Method used to check if KeyContainer contains user access token keys

Returns:
true if KeyContainer contains user keys, false otherwise
